file.name: schema.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: Transações bandeiradas com cartões description: API para autenticação de transações bandeiradas através do protocolo Flow3DS version: '1.0' servers: - url: https://api.sandbox.bankly.com.br paths: /card-network-transactions/simulator/challenge: post: tags: - Autenticação 3DS summary: Simulação de criação do desafio (challengeId) description: |

Teste o fluxo de autenticação 3DS, simulando a criação do challengeId, id da transação gerado para identificar o desafio que deverá ser enviado a seu cliente.

stable scope: card.network.transactions.3ds.write
[block:callout] { "type": "info", "title": "Importante", "body": "Este endpoint funciona apenas em ambiente de sandbox." } [/block] parameters: - $ref: "http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/ApiVersion" - $ref: "http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/Authorization" requestBody: content: application/json-patch+json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateChallengeSimulatorCommand' application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateChallengeSimulatorCommand' text/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateChallengeSimulatorCommand' application/*+json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateChallengeSimulatorCommand' responses: '202': description: Desafio criado com sucesso. '400': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/400' '500': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/500' security: - Bearer: [ ] /card-network-transactions/authentication/challenge/{challengeId}/confirm: patch: tags: - Autenticação 3DS summary: Confirmação do desafio description: |

Após o seu cliente responder o desafio, utilize este endpoint para confirmar ou não a sua identidade.

stable scope: card.network.transactions.3ds.write
parameters: - name: challengeId in: path required: true description: Id recebido via webhook e que foi associado ao desafio enviado ao cliente do parceiro. No caso de sandbox, trata-se do id retornado na simulação de criação do challengeId. schema: type: string nullable: true - $ref: "http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/ApiVersion" - $ref: "http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/Authorization" requestBody: content: application/json-patch+json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfirmChallengeCommand' application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfirmChallengeCommand' text/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfirmChallengeCommand' application/*+json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfirmChallengeCommand' responses: '204': description: Desafio confirmado com sucesso. '400': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/400' '404': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/404' '409': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/409' '500': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/500' security: - Bearer: [ ] components: schemas: CreateChallengeSimulatorCommand: required: - amount - card - merchant type: object properties: card: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChallengeCard' deviceChannel: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceChannel' merchant: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChallengeMerchant' amount: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChallengeAmount' additionalProperties: false ConfirmChallengeCommand: required: - allowTransaction - documentNumber type: object properties: allowTransaction: type: boolean documentNumber: minLength: 1 type: string additionalProperties: false ChallengeCard: required: - proxy type: object properties: proxy: minLength: 1 type: string additionalProperties: false DeviceChannel: enum: - APP - BROWSER type: string description: Selecione o canal por meio do qual é realizada a tentativa de compra. ChallengeMerchant: required: - name type: object description: Nome do e-commerce no qual foi realizada a compra. properties: name: minLength: 1 type: string additionalProperties: false ChallengeAmount: required: - value - currency type: object properties: value: minimum: 0 exclusiveMinimum: true type: number format: double currency: maxLength: 3 minLength: 3 type: string description: "Código [ISO 4217](https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) da moeda utilizada. Exemplo: \"986\" para BRL." additionalProperties: false securitySchemes: Bearer: type: http description: Inclua o token de autorização do tipo Bearer scheme: bearer bearerFormat: JWT x-explorer-enabled: true x-samples-enabled: true x-samples-languages: - csharp - javascript - node - go - java - kotlin - php - python - ruby - swift - cplusplus - powershell - curl

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/card-network-transactions/authentication/challenge/{challengeId}/confirm": patch: parameters: parse parameter "": at 1:2681: external "http://localhost:3320/commons/components": get: http: do: Get "http://localhost:3320/commons/components": host "localhost:3320" is not allowed
